metadata.title: HashiCorp Vault Associate VA-002 Practice Questions

8.name: Be Aware of Vault Enterprise Features

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Compare Authentication Methods (Domain 1)?
questions.explanation: AWS IAM/EC2 Auth Method is a key concept in Compare Authentication Methods. This domain covers topics essential for the HashiCorp Vault Associate exam.

questions.question: A professional is tasked with choose an authentication method based on use case. What should be the first step?
options: Assess the current state and identify requirements
Document the findings in a report
questions.explanation: The first step in any compare authentication methods task is to assess the current state before implementing changes.

questions.question: Which concept in Compare Authentication Methods is most closely related to differentiate human vs machine authentication?
options: Compare Authentication Methods governance and oversight
Compare Authentication Methods implementation and operations
Compare Authentication Methods assessment and testing
questions.explanation: Differentiate human vs machine authentication falls under the implementation and operations aspect of Compare Authentication Methods.

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Compare Authentication Methods (Domain 1)?
questions.explanation: GitHub Auth Method is a key concept in Compare Authentication Methods. This domain covers topics essential for the HashiCorp Vault Associate exam.
